General.Name: Middle East Paper Co
General.Description: Middle East Company for Manufacturing and Producing Paper, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells container boards and industrial papers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and Europe. The company operates through two segments, Manufacturing and Trading. It provides containerboards comprising MEPFLUTE high performance fluting, MEPLINER test liner, MEPDUAL dual use, MEPKRAFT Kraft liner board, and MEPWHITE white top test liner products for use in beverages, consumer durables, detergents, industrial goods, and processed food industries; and MEPCHEM semi-chemical fluting products for frozen and fresh food applications. The company also offers paperboards, including MEPCORE core boards for film, tape and label, textiles, and paper applications; MEPGYPSUM plasterboard liners for interior wall lining systems; and MEPLAMINATE absorbent Kraft products for laminated furniture and shelves, and counters and floors. In addition, it is involved in the wholesale and retail of paper and used paper, carton, and plastic waste products; production and sale of tissue paper rolls; wholesale of wastes, scrap, and other products; provision of waste management and treatment services; and recycling and collection of carton waste. Middle East Company for Manufacturing and Producing Paper was founded in 2000 and is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
